snippet: Brad Keselowski and Jeff Gordon avoided any penalties for their brawl, but two crew chiefs and four crew members from Hendrick Motorsports, Gordon’s team, were punished.
abstract: Brad Keselowski and Jeff Gordon avoid Nascar penalties for postrace fight in Texas; two crew chiefs and four crew members from Gordon's team receive punishments for brawl.
lead_paragraph: Brad Keselowski and Jeff Gordon avoided any penalties for their brawl, but two crew chiefs and four crew members from Hendrick Motorsports, Gordon’s team, were punished.

headline.main: Nascar Fines Crew Members for Postrace Fight in Texas

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
